Settings: Shuffles active, passive, and specialty abilities among jobs. Groups of related abilities will mostly be kept together, e.g. Fire, Fira, Firaga, and Flare will end up on one job, while Apex Predator plus many, but not all, of the Ranger's X Slayer abilities will end up on a single job.
Randomly shuffles cost types (i.e. MP, HP, BP, PG) among job abilities. The actual costs are adjusted accordingly. Displayed costs are updated in game, but the ability descriptions are not.
Shuffles stats among jobs.
Swap
E.g. the Freelancer could inherit all the stats of the White Mage.
Random
E.g. the Freelancer could inherit HP stats of the White Mage, MP stats of the Black Mage, ....
Shuffles weapon/shield boosts among jobs.
Swap
E.g. the Freelancer could inherit all boosts of the White Mage.
Random
E.g. the Freelancer could inherit the Sword boost D of the White Mage, Shield boost C of the Black Mage, ....
Shuffle items among chests, quests, enemy drops and enemy steals. Items dropped by enemies, found in grass, etc. for quests are kept in their default locations.

Shuffle asterisk bosses, Hall of Tribulation bosses, and replace Night's Nexus' arms with Hall of Tribulation bosses.
